channel.title: Multiple Bots?
channel.description:
Hi everyone...i have been reading these forums like 48 hours straight trying to learn everything i can and got pretty much everything set up. the only info i have yet to find is how i open multiple bots with Aryan? like do i need to copy and paste the run-bot and create new ones each with a unique proxy like run-bot 1,2,3 etc...to how ever many i want to run iam sure it is much easier if iam making any sense at all can someone plz let me know how i run more than one Aryan.....thanks alot for all your help and information
edit:oh yeah if u have a slower proxy will it make the bot bug out iam using the /tutisland() and its not 100 percent atm...thx alot again

item.title: Multiple Bots?

@freeza wrote:

thx alot for all the info been looking for a fast socks 5 proxy forever lol

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple Bots?
item.dc:creator: @sk8nguitar sk8nguitar
item.description:
@sk8nguitar wrote:

A slow proxy will make the script get all screwy sometimes because it has a slow response. So you may wanna find one with a good response time so it will take clicks instantly instead of a huge lag.

Read full topic
